sentences.en: Although people were overwrought, they could not help noticing these beauties of nature.
sentences.cn: 虽然这时候众人都怀着紧张的心情无心注意到景色上面,然而园里的一花一草,一木一石,都 显然 地立在那里,逃不过众人的眼睛.

sentences.en: Clara was tired and overwrought after all the problems of the last few days.
sentences.cn: 经历了过去几天的重重困难之后，克拉拉既疲惫又紧张。

sentences.en: He's written'she's suspicious of overwrought sentiments or overblown claims content with common sense. "
sentences.cn: 他的书面 “,她的怀疑情绪过度紧张或过分要求,内容与常识. ”

sentences.en: His mother noticed how overwrought he was.
In fact the asasas an answer, is too slow and overwrought with personal philosophy.
sentences.cn: 在影片的末尾,我们得到了解释.但答案来得太慢,而且涉及了过多的个人哲学理念.

sentences.en: Literally, I was overwrought from the pressures of work and life at college.
sentences.cn: 逐渐逐渐的, 我负担过重了,最后变成了“郁闷”的综合症状.

sentences.en: Scarlett found that it relieved her overwrought nerves.
sentences.cn: 思嘉发现这样可以使她过分紧张的神经放松一些.

sentences.en: She didn't mean to offend you; she was overwrought.
sentences.cn: 她请你, 你要是不回个信儿就可能把她得罪了.

sentences.en: She was in a very overwrought state after the accident.
sentences.cn: 事故发生后她精神十分紧张.

sentences.en: She's overwrought because of all the work and difficulties.
sentences.cn: 她被所有的工作困难弄得精疲力竭.

sentences.en: When you're emotionally overwrought, it can be hard to remember exactly what was said.
sentences.cn: 在情绪过度劳累时, 要准确地记住说过的话往往会很难.

words.tran_cn: 自负的，过于自信的；过分的

trans.tran_cn: 神经紧张的，忧虑的，烦恼的
